# LogMaru

Official website: https://logmaru.work/

LogMaru is a local-first Windows desktop app for activity logging and time tracking.
User data is stored locally on the user's device.

## Audience
- End users looking to download and use LogMaru
- Users checking privacy policy, terms, and changelog

## Preferred pages
- Home (EN): https://logmaru.work/
- Home (JA): https://logmaru.work/ja/
- Download (EN): https://logmaru.work/download/
- Download (JA): https://logmaru.work/ja/download/
- Changelog (EN): https://logmaru.work/changelog/
- Changelog (JA): https://logmaru.work/ja/changelog/
- Contact (EN): https://logmaru.work/contact/
- Contact (JA): https://logmaru.work/ja/contact/
- Privacy (EN): https://logmaru.work/privacy/
- Privacy (JA): https://logmaru.work/ja/privacy/
- Terms (EN): https://logmaru.work/terms/
- Terms (JA): https://logmaru.work/ja/terms/

## Crawling/indexing references
- Sitemap index: https://logmaru.work/sitemap-index.xml
- Robots: https://logmaru.work/robots.txt
